Position: Representative to the EU Institutions  
• Create and maintain regular and effective networks with EU institutions, key go vernments (EU

• Identify and analyse opportunities and risks, and advise on relevant political and regulatory 
matters to inform strategy development and implementat ion in EMEA region. Focus on energy

• Liaise and represent MHI in Global & European Associations, e.g. Hydrogen Council, Hydrogen 
Europe, EU Clean Hy drogen Alliance, European CCUS Forum, CO2 Value Europe, etc.

EMEA region  
• Brief Senior Executives

Position: Representative to the EU Institutions  
• Establish Brussels Liaison Office and associated function  
• Create and maintain regular and effective contacts with EU institutions, key governments (EU 
Member Sta tes Permanent Representations, Japan) and relevant stakeholders  
• Monitor, analyse and advise on relevant political, economic and financial developments. Focus 
on energy - and climate -related trends, incl. carbon reduction mechanisms and technologies  
 • Repr esentation in European Associations and Experts Groups at EU level; elected Executive 
Board member of the European Association for Storage of Energy (EASE) (Jan 2016 – Dec 
2019)  
• Co-author / speaker on a variety of decarbonisation -related topics

Position: Principal Policy Officer  
• Support Founding Members and Secretary General to establish association

level  
• Represent EASE in different international, European, and local events (speaker and participant)  
• Representation in EU Experts  Groups: Smart Grids, ENTSO -E, etc.
